name: MonsterSeas
description:
Ahoy!

Choose your ship and sail across the waters of MonsterSeas. Battle original creatures, collect unique items and solve the mystery of Aidah.

In this roguelike you have to think tactical. Consider wind, crew, etc. Many monsters and bosses can surprise you with their special abilities and sense of humor. Fortunately, you can always ask your parrot what to do! Or a friend in cooperation mode :D

The game is still in early acces. I'm actively developing it whenever I have time. Any feedback is welcome ;)
